system.description:
You have earned a position of power and authority over a people who commonly don't gather together or acknowledge authority. This respect is not to be taken lightly.

REQUIREMENTS

To become The Ogre Chieftain, you have earned the Fellowship of the Ogres or a Giant.

The Ogre Chieftain starts with the Move Mighty Giant.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-ogre-chieftain.Item.8hOusdWVEXYHCFrB]{MIGHTY GIANT}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-ogre-chieftain.Item.jJFVOV8wutXUSMKI]{CROSS-COUNTER}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-ogre-chieftain.Item.MIbW2SKG6xxzrjNt]{FEATS OF LEGEND}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-ogre-chieftain.Item.YpLVvYc2juJR7yEa]{GOD OF THUNDER}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-ogre-chieftain.Item.RDpDCGg2YSOUhkuZ]{I CAN BE STRONG FOR YOU}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-ogre-chieftain.Item.VsHKQBDjD9HgesFg]{STAND ASIDE}

advancements.name: Take the Ogre's Core Moves (Protect The Little Ones, Uncontrollable Strength, and Toss Aside). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
